data.name: Stir Trek
data.description: Stir Trek is a one-day conference in Columbus, Ohio focused on teaching software developers the latest and greatest in technologies, techniques, and tools. The full day of content is always concluded with a private screening of a blockbuster film on its opening day.

relatedRecords.name: #PerfMatters Conference
relatedRecords.description: A two-day community Web Performance conference happening March 31 & April 1, 2020 in Redwood City, CA. Workhops on March 30, 2020 to help get people up to speed on Web Performance. Hackathon on April 2, 2020 to improve online performance documentation.

relatedRecords.name: IT Pro Camp 2020
relatedRecords.description: Putting on an event of this size takes a lot of people. To keep the costs down, we need generous people like you to volunteer your time. Sign up using the button below, As a Reward, all voluteers will be able to take the certification testing on Friday evening before the event. Now how cool is that…
